replies.body:
you're a good friend and pretty much always nice to talk to. you're learning fast and probably one of the best defenders i know. 
sometimes you can be a little bit mean but you also say it's a joke but when you say it im not sure if it's a joke or if you actually mean it lol. but yea ur probs just joking with me when u say that kinda stuff.
im not really actually sure what to say more about you but i guess it's because we havent talked to each other in a while but yea, overall good pvper & defender and rlly nice friend.

replies.body:
one of my best friends on minecraft & avicus. when we talked recently (like more of a private talk and not in a scrim) we had really fun. you've improved alot when it comes to pvp which is good. when i first joined celestial  // newdawn i didnt really like you as a leader. i believe i thought you were quite bad at strating and that we pretty much used to lose when you lead, i never told you anything cus ye know :). now, i think you're a great leader and it feels like you know what ur doing (which i dont lol). it feels like you can play most positions apart from actually defender. 
overall you're a really good friend and pvper, also really nice to talk to but i guess i havent talked to you that much lately either but i guess when we've been talking it's been really fun but i guess it's because of my ban etc.

you're a really nice person, also really chill. you're a good pvper and also really good at strating. I haven't talked to yiu lately probs cus you joined jala and cus of my ban but i guess from all the times we've talked it's been fun apart from all the shit scrims. You're a very chill person overall and i dont think ive ever heard you rage or actually get angry lver something which i guess is good ?
we'd talk more tho

not rlly sure, your ping is both an advantage and a didadvantage so ill say 7:10
